languages.text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to <u>wearer's INT</u>) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with armour penetration equal to <u>wearer's INT</u>) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to <u>wearer's INT</u>) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to <u>wearer's INT</u>) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to <u>wearer's INT</u>) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

languages.text:
每当装备者结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，都会对邻近所有生物造成{uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de}点{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}（拥有{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence}{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）。
如果此效果对3名以上生物造成伤害，装备者会受到{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}效果影响。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence} {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，都会对邻近所有生物造成{uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de}点{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}（拥有{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence}{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）。
如果此效果对3名以上生物造成伤害，装备者会受到{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}效果影响。

每当装备者结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，都会对邻近所有生物造成{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}，等同于{uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de}，此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}等同于<u>装备者的智力</u>。
如果此效果对3名以上生物造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，装备者会受到{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响。

每当装备者结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，都会对邻近所有生物造成{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}，等同于{uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de}，此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}等同于<u>装备者的智力</u>。
如果此效果对3名以上生物造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，装备者会受到{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响。

languages.text:
Завершая свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, персонаж наносит {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетического урона{/g} всем существам на соседних клетках с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g}, равным <u>ИНТ персонажа</u>.
Если урон получило более 3 существ, на персонажа накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to <u>wearer's INT</u>) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Завершая свой ход, персонаж наносит <u>(3 × бонус ИНТ)</u> энергетического урона всем существам на соседних клетках.
Если урон получило более 3 существ, на персонажа накладывается ошеломление.

Завершая свой ход, персонаж наносит <u>(3 × бонус ИНТ)</u> энергетического урона всем существам на соседних клетках.
Если урон получило более 3 существ, на персонажа накладывается ошеломление.

Завершая свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, персонаж наносит {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетического урона{/g} всем существам на соседних клетках с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g}, равным <u>ИНТ персонажа</u>.
Если урон получило более 3 существ, на персонажа накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}.

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了するたびに、隣接する全ての生物に{uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} の{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}（+ <u>使用者の知性</u>に等しい数値の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}）を与える。
{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージを受けた{/g}生物の数が3を超えると、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to <u>wearer's INT</u>) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了するたび、隣接する生物すべてに<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}を与える。
ダメージを受けた生物の数が3を超えると、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を受ける。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了するたびに、隣接する全ての生物に{uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} の{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}（+ <u>使用者の知性</u>に等しい数値の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}）を与える。
{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージを受けた{/g}生物の数が3を超えると、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受ける。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了するたびに、隣接する全ての生物に{uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} の{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}（+ <u>使用者の知性</u>に等しい数値の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}）を与える。
{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージを受けた{/g}生物の数が3を超えると、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受ける。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador termine su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, causa {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de}de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño por energía{/g} (con {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence} de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}) a todas las criaturas adyacentes.
Si la cantidad de criaturas dañadas es mayor que 3, el portador sufre el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence} {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador termine su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, causa {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de}de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño por energía{/g} (con {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence} de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}) a todas las criaturas adyacentes.
Si la cantidad de criaturas dañadas es mayor que 3, el portador sufre el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}.

Cada vez que el portador termine su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, causa {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño de energía{/g} (con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} igual a la <u>INT del portador</u>) a todas las criaturas adyacentes.
Si la cantidad de criaturas {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañadas{/g} es mayor que 3, el portador sufre el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beendet, verursacht er {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} (mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} in Höhe der <u>INT des Trägers</u>) bei allen angrenzenden Kreaturen.
{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Trifft{/g} er mehr als 3 Kreaturen, wird der Träger mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to <u>wearer's INT</u>) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beendet, verursacht er <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} bei allen angrenzenden Kreaturen.
Übersteigt die Anzahl der getroffenen Kreaturen 3, erleidet der Träger den {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}.

Immer wenn der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beendet, verursacht er {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} (mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} in Höhe der <u>INT des Trägers</u>) bei allen angrenzenden Kreaturen.
Übersteigt die Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Kreaturen 3, erleidet der Träger den {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g}.

languages.text:
À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur inflige {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} points de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} (avec une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} égale à <u>INT de l'utilisateur</u>) à toutes les créatures adjacentes.
Si le nombre de créatures blessées est supérieur à 3, l'utilisateur subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to <u>wearer's INT</u>) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Au termine de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur inflige <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} à toutes les créatures adjacentes.
S'il inflige des dégâts à plus de 3 créatures, il subit l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}.

Au termine de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur inflige <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} à toutes les créatures adjacentes.
S'il inflige des dégâts à plus de 3 créatures, il subit l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}.

Au terme de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur inflige {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} points de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} (avec une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} égale à <u>INT de l'utilisateur</u>) à toutes les créatures adjacentes.
Si le nombre de créatures {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}blessées{/g} est supérieur à 3, l'utilisateur subit l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}.

languages.text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence} {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence} {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} her sonlandırdığında bitişikteki tüm yaratıklara {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}enerji hasarı{/g} ({unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} ile) verir.
Hasar alan yaratıkların sayısı 3'ü aşarsa takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallama{/g} etkisine maruz kalır.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence} {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} her sonlandırdığında bitişikteki tüm yaratıklara {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}enerji hasarı{/g} ({unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} ile) verir.
Hasar alan yaratıkların sayısı 3'ü aşarsa takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallama{/g} etkisine maruz kalır.
